name: Disease Detection for Fish Species
desc: Developed a web-based system to classify freshwater fish species and detect fish diseases using deep learning. Used ResNet50 for classification and SSD MobileNet V2 for disease detection. Integrated with a Flask backend and HTML/JavaScript frontend for real-time prediction and visualization. Achieved ~97.8% accuracy.
image: Fish Species Classification and Disease Detection

name: Handwriting Recognition System
desc: Built a system to convert handwritten text into digital format using deep learning. Built using Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV and NumPy

name: Gold Price Predictions
desc: Built a full-stack web application to predict gold prices using machine learning. Implemented data preprocessing, feature selection, and model training in Python with scikit-learn. Integrated the trained model into a Flask backend and designed a responsive HTML/JavaScript frontend for user input and real-time prediction.
